descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Joel Embiid and Trevor Ariza exchange words throughout the first quarter eventually having to be separated at half court.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Embiid, Ariza go back and forth throughout first quarter) 2021/05/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Embiid, Ariza go back and forth throughout first quarter

videos.description: Udonis Haslem checks in to a loud ovation. He would score four points, then get tossed three minutes into his season debut.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Haslem ejected after rousing ovation in brief season debut) 2021/05/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Haslem ejected after rousing ovation in brief season debut

videos.description: Jimmy Butler somehow finds Bam Adebayo behind him for the two-handed jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Butler gets caught in the air, but finds Adebayo for the dunk) 2021/05/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Butler gets caught in the air, but finds Adebayo for the dunk

videos.description: Tobias Harris gets out in transition and flushes home the one-handed dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Harris attacks basket for the dunk) 2021/05/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Harris attacks basket for the dunk

videos.description: Jimmy Butler, Bam Adebayo and Udonis Haslem all react to Haslem's season debut ending with an ejection in under three minutes.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Presser (Reactions to Haslem's debut bring the heat) 2021/05/13

videos.headline: Reactions to Haslem's debut bring the heat
